translations.landing.philosophy.coreBeliefs.principle: The best automation doesn't replace humans - it amplifies them. Every feature we design keeps humans in control.
If you can't inspect what happened, you can't trust it. Every action has logs, screenshots, and audit trails.
Your data shouldn't leave your network. No cloud dependencies, no data phoning home, complete control.
